p.span: For each event, calculate the normalized value of the field in the appropriate context. A normalized value is the distance of the field from the domain minimun (field-domainMin) / (domainMax-domainMin). The field "Normalized" will contain the result.
xsNormalize field [FROM context] [IN container] [BY class] [SCOPED scope] [AS outputfield]
xsNormalize Height FROM Height IN MyHeight BY Gender SCOPED private

In each event, determines the normalized value of Height in the context 'Height' in the container 'MyHeight' by class field Gender in the scope 'private'. Place this value in a field called 'Normalized' (the default field).
field, context, container, class, scope, outfield
The field in each event to look up in the container/context/class/scope.
If specified, use this as the context instead of field
The name of the container containing the context.
The name of the class field.
The scope (private, app) where the container is stored.
The name of the output field, instead of the default 'Normalized'.
Each event has the field 'Normalized', containing the noralized value of the field specified above.
